title: WinX DVD Ripper Platinum
description: WinX DVD Ripper Platinum is a Windows-based DVD ripper software capable of ripping any DVD (even latest encrypted DVD discs/ISO images) to mainstream videos, such as rip DVD to AVI, DVD to MP4, H.264, MPEG, WMV, MOV, FLV and M2TS. It also helps faultlessly convert DVD to Apple (iPhone/6/6 Plus/5S, iPad/Air 2/mini 3, iPod/5, Apple TV/3, iTunes), Android (Google New Nexus 7, Samsung Galaxy Note 4/Edge/S5 (Mini), HTC One M8, Amazon Kindle Fire HDX), Microsoft (WP8, Surface Pro 3, Xbox One), Chromecast, Sony PSP/PS4, Nokia Lumia 2520, etc. This DVD ripper brings No.1 fast DVD ripping solution thanks to the cutting-edge tech to support Multi-core (up to 8) CPU and Hyper-threading.
